name: Banished from Asgard
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
Exhaust Aldrif Odinsdottir → remove Banished from Asgard from the game.
Discard 1 [[asgard]] card you control. You are stunned. If no card was discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Hel’s Retribution
text: “Hela has come to settle her score with the Asgardian usurper.” When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of [[asgard]] cards in play. [hazard]

name: Hela
text: While there are other minions in play, Hela cannot take damage. Forced Interrupt: When you defeat a minion, discard a card from your hand. (Angela’s nemesis minion.)

name: Hel-Wolf
text: [star]The engaged player must defend against Hel-Wolf’s attacks with an ally they control, if able. [star]Boost: This attack gains overkill.

name: Disir
text: Forced Interrupt: When Disir would be defeated, shuffle them into the encounter deck instead. [star]Boost: After this activation ends, shuffle this card back into the encounter deck.

name: Back from Hel
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter discard pile for the bottom most minion and reveal it. Boost: If you are engaged with a minion. this attack gains 1 additional boost icon ([boost]).
